ovdesc.p: Account Closure process involves a step asking the option to close the account through cash payment/funds transfer. This table is used to store the information on the above mentioned transaction. It also stores the Account no. and the balance in the account (taken from ECB). The information on how the user has opted to close the particular account can be retrieved from this table.

desc.p: Identifies the Currency of the Account.
3 type SSS (uppercase alpha) character or 1-3 numeric character Currency code. Cannot be changed after record has been authorised. (Mandatory Input)
It must be an existing code on the CURRENCY Table.
Holds the value of a particular account's balance from Account table

Defines the account closure type. Ex:Account closure by Cash/Funds transfer.
